name: io.github.verygoodplugins/whatsapp-mcp
title: WhatsApp MCP
description: Read, search, and send WhatsApp messages via Claude

tools.name: search_contacts
tools.description: Search contacts by name or phone number

tools.name: get_contact
tools.description: Resolve phone number to contact name

tools.name: list_messages
tools.description: Get messages with filters, date ranges, and sorting

tools.name: get_chat
tools.description: Get specific chat metadata by JID

tools.name: get_direct_chat_by_contact
tools.description: Find direct message chat with a contact

tools.name: get_contact_chats
tools.description: List all chats involving a contact

tools.name: get_last_interaction
tools.description: Get last message with a contact

tools.name: get_message_context
tools.description: Get messages around a specific message

tools.name: send_message
tools.description: Send text message to contact or group

tools.name: download_media
tools.description: Download media from a received message
